name: World
description: Manages entities (actors), components, and provides query capabilities for the Entity Component System architecture.

properties.name: actors
properties.description: Collection of all actors in the world, indexed by their unique ID

properties.name: actorCount
properties.description: Total number of actors currently in the world

methods.name: addActor
methods.description: Adds an actor to the world

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: The actor instance to add to the world

methods.name: removeActor
methods.description: Removes an actor from the world

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the actor to remove

methods.returns: boolean - true if the actor was removed, false if not found

methods.name: getActor
methods.description: Retrieves an actor by its ID

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the actor to retrieve

methods.returns: Actor | undefined - The actor if found, undefined otherwise

methods.name: query
methods.description: Queries the world for actors matching specific component criteria

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Object specifying which components to match (has, hasAny, without)

methods.returns: Actor[] - Array of actors matching the criteria

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes all actors from the world

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates all systems and actors in the world

parameters.name: deltaTime
parameters.description: Time elapsed since last update in milliseconds

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders all visible actors in the world

parameters.name: renderer
parameters.description: The renderer to use for drawing

methods.name: findActorsByName
methods.description: Finds all actors with a specific name
methods.returns: Actor[] - Array of actors with matching name

methods.name: findActorsByTag
methods.description: Finds all actors with a specific tag
methods.returns: Actor[] - Array of actors with the specified tag
